title: Whenever I type I crash
body: When I'm in a match and want to say something my game always crashes for atleast 5 minutes before something happens. It can freeze my computer or even turn it off sometimes. So being unable to communicate with my teams is frustrating. I want to know if this is a CPU/ graphics card: battery problem. Or it's just my game

replies.body: Hmmmmm I'd definitely venture to guess that something is going awkwardly wrong with your game files if simply pulling up the chatbox causes a crash. Let's try running a repair through the client options really quickly, test it in a custom/practice game, and let me know if that helps.
